_app_header_connected_to.comment: header of the room remote app. This will be followed by the name of the account which is used in conference or meeting room
_app_header_conference_room.comment: room type used for the meeting which is connected to the room remote app
_app_remote_video_now_on.comment: announce the state change of Video to on in the UI
_app_remote_video_on.comment: label for Video on for room device state
_app_remote_video_now_off.comment: announce the state change of Video to off in the UI
_app_remote_video_off.comment: label for Video off for room device state
_app_remote_mic_now_on.comment: announce the state change of mic to on in the UI
_app_remote_mic_on.comment: label for Mic on for room device state
_app_remote_mic_now_off.comment: announce the state change of mic to off in the UI
_app_remote_mic_off.comment: label for Mic off for room device state
_app_remote_captions_now_on.comment: announce the state change of captions to on in the UI
_app_remote_captions_on.comment: label for Captions on for room device state
_app_remote_captions_now_off.comment: announce the state change of captions to off in the UI
_app_remote_captions_off.comment: label for Captions off for room device state
_app_remote_layout.comment: label for Layout for room device state
_app_remote_layout_clicked.comment: announcement to make when layout button is clicked
_app_remote_layout_option_gallery.commen: label for Layout option of Gallery for room device
_app_remote_layout_option_content.commen: label for Layout option of Content for room device
_app_remote_layout_option_content_and_ga: label for Layout option of Content and Gallery for room device
label for Layout option of Large Gallery for room device
label for Layout option of Together mode for room device
_app_remote_layout_option_selected.comme: selected is appended for a particular option. For example Gallery selected, Content selected
_app_remote_end_call.comment: label for Leave for room device state
_app_remote_end_call_clicked.comment: announcement made once leave button is clicked
_app_remote_volume_down.comment: label for volume down for room device state
_app_remote_volume_increased.comment: announcement to make once volume is increased
_app_remote_volume_up.comment: label for volume up for room device state
_app_remote_volume_decreased.comment: announcement to make once volume is decreased
experience_extensibility_error_page_acce: You donâ€™t have the permission to access the extensibility application
experience_extensibility_error_page_gene: Something went wrong. Please try again.
_experience_extensibility_error_page_gen: Generic message displayed on the error page when something unexpected happened
